name: Richard Carroll
text: Great place to come with a tanker anyway.  In and out no problem less than 2hrs gate too gate. Look at the post from other drivers about what to do and u'll have no problems. That's what I did. Stay safe out there everyone

name: ricardo Givens
text: In and out. Small sign for gate 2 second sign bigger little pass main location

name: Kiki Warren
text: My job can send me there any day. The ppl are nice from the guards to the plant workers.

name: Thomas
text: I65 Exit 19. Take Hwy 43 north about 10minutes.  Go through village of Axis.  Plant is on the left at about the 18mm.  If you have a tanker pull on scale.  Wait for green light.  Then back off and park on the right and go check in.

name: Victor McIntyre
text: It's a plant up on hwy 43 in axis all

name: Timothy Oster
text: It was a great experience and I learned a lot. I would gladly work with them again.

name: Valarie Helton
text: People don't like telemarketers and even though it's not and it's really a research company, people do not want calls not knowing this makes it very difficult..there has to be another way to do this kind of research.
